title: Tech Stocks Are Down. Here's What That Means for the Economy - TIME
content:
1. Tech Stocks Are Down. Here's What That Means for the Economy  TIME
  2. Is it a tech bubble? Stock prices and start-up layoffs send Silicon Valley reeling  The Washington Post
  3. The Tech Industry’s Epic Two-Year Run Sputters  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Big Tech Is Dead! ☠  InvestorPlace
  5. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Big Tech has shed over $1 trillion in value over the last three trading sessions as many companies are reeling from the effects of not meeting earnings expectations.
